name: Marvel Comics Secret Identities Trivia Quiz | Entertainment | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Cyclops.

	The X-Man with the funky eyes.

Nova.

	The Human Rocket, the first twelve issues of the '70s series are absolute classics.

Dr Doom.

	Is there a more evil villain in comics? The Fantastic Four don't think so. He had a Super Villain Team Up series in the '70s.

Thor.

	Formerly of Journey Into Mystery, then his own title.

Hell Cat.

	She used to be an Avenger, and I think a Defender.

The Incredible Hulk.

	On TV he was know as David Banner.

Silver Surfer.

	The former herald of Galactus.

Moon Knight.

	He was the origional Moon Knight. The Jack Of Hearts, a corny hero, was named Jack Hart.

Captain America.

	The Star Spangled Avenger! Someone else was Cap for a short while back when that was the 'cool' thing to do.
